snippet: Les Ballets Trockadero de Monte Carlo, the all-male ballet troupe, brings its meticulous adoration of the art form, expressed entertainingly, to the Joyce Theater.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews performance by drag dance troupe Les Ballets Trockadero de Monte Carlo at Joyce Theater.
lead_paragraph: Les Ballets Trockadero de Monte Carlo, the all-male ballet troupe, brings its meticulous adoration of the art form, expressed entertainingly, to the Joyce Theater.

headline.seo: Les Ballets Trockadero de Monte Carlo, at 40, at the Joyce
